name: Pool on the Roof
long_description: The heavy door begins to close as you walk out to find not a welcoming pool, but an empty cracked concrete stretching out towards the ledge of the roof- you've been tricked! As the door swings back you notice a black automated control box.
short_description: A normal roof with a security lock on the door and definitely no pool.

room_features.name: Heavy Door
room_features.description: A large metal structure which is probably gonna make you late for class. Psych! You would never go to class.
room_features.description_hacked: The door swings open freely now. Go as you please...

room_features.name: Control Box
room_features.description: Standard black plastic covering to hide some hackable computery insides.

room_features.name: Ledge
room_features.description: No way but... down? It's only two stories...

room_connections.label: Hall
room_connections.description: the heavy door leading back to the Hall.
